name: RPG Map Builder
description:
Hello! This is a small project for board gamers.


About


I decided to make a collection of everything you need to design maps for your adventures. If you have any suggestions for improving the project, please contact! Enjoy!


Version


V.1.2

  • Added Character Sheet on english
  • Small fixes


V.1

  • Imported all textures and objetcs
  • Customise components with textures
